title: rafaykhan
author: rafaykhan
content: Hello everyone, I am looking to buy Amazon GC's on daily basis of any denomination but the discount would be between 75-77% i.e : buying 100$ GC for 75 or 77$ crypto.I will use the escrow service of this forum https://bitcointalk.org/ if you're not a reputed member otherwise if you're a reputed member then I will go first and pay you then you can send me the GC's e-codes.I will go with the good discount offer.

comments.author: Heisenberg63
comments.body: Quote from: rafaykhan on April 14, 2023, 03:48:19 PMHello everyone, I am looking to buy Amazon GC's on daily basis of any denomination but the discount would be between 75-77% i.e : buying 100$ GC for 75 or 77$ crypto.I will use the escrow service of this forum https://bitcointalk.org/ if you're not a reputed member otherwise if you're a reputed member then I will go first and pay you then you can send me the GC's e-codes.I will go with the good discount offer.I will PM you with an offer.
